languages.text: {n}Выражение глаз ксеноса неуловимо меняется — горевший в них огонь исчезает, оставив после себя разочарование... и скуку.{/n} "Что ж. Я получил ответ на вопрос, с которым пришел на мостик. Время готовиться к нашему пиршеству". {n}Друкари бросает последний взгляд на офицеров, которые, кажется, сами не верят в свое счастье, после чего разворачивается и идет прочь.{/n}

{n}The expression in his eyes subtly changes — the fire that burned in them disappears, leaving behind disappointment... and boredom.{/n} "Well. I came to the bridge with a question, and now I have the answer. It is time to prepare for our feast." {n}The Drukhari casts one last look at the officers, who do not seem to believe their luck, then turns and strides off.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Выражение глаз ксеноса неуловимо меняется — горевший в них огонь исчезает, оставив после себя разочарование... и скуку.{/n} "Что ж. Я получил ответ на вопрос, с которым пришел на мостик. Время готовиться к нашему пиршеству". {n}Друкари бросает последний взгляд на офицеров, которые, кажется, сами не верят в свое счастье, после чего разворачивается и идет прочь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的神情发生了微妙的变化。他眼中熊熊燃烧的火焰消失了，如今只留下失望，以及……无趣。{/n}“好吧，我带着疑问来到这里，如今也得到了答案。是时候准备一下我们的盛宴了。”{n}玛拉斋瞟了那几名军官一眼，便转身大步离开了。死里逃生的几个人简直不敢相信自己的好运。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The expression in his eyes subtly changes — the fire that burned in them disappears, leaving behind disappointment... and boredom.{/n} "Well. I came to the bridge with a question, and now I have the answer. It is time to prepare for our feast." {n}The Drukhari casts one last look at the officers, who do not seem to believe their luck, then turns and strides off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的神情发生了微妙的变化。他眼中熊熊燃烧的火焰消失了，如今只留下失望，以及……无趣。{/n}“好吧，我带着疑问来到这里，如今也得到了答案。是时候准备一下我们的盛宴了。”{n}玛拉斋瞟了那几名军官一眼，便转身大步离开了。死里逃生的几个人简直不敢相信自己的好运。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Se produce un sutil cambio en su expresión; el fuego que ardía en sus ojos desaparece, y tras él solamente queda decepción... y aburrimiento.{/n} «Bueno. He venido al puente con una pregunta, y ya tengo mi respuesta. Es hora de prepararnos para nuestro festín». {n}El drukhari echa un último vistazo a los oficiales, que apenas pueden creerse la suerte que han tenido; luego se da la vuelta y se marcha dando zancadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The expression in his eyes subtly changes — the fire that burned in them disappears, leaving behind disappointment... and boredom.{/n} "Well. I came to the bridge with a question, and now I have the answer. It is time to prepare for our feast." {n}The Drukhari casts one last look at the officers, who do not seem to believe their luck, then turns and strides off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce un sutil cambio en su expresión; el fuego que ardía en sus ojos desaparece, y tras él solamente queda decepción... y aburrimiento.{/n} «Bueno. He venido al puente con una pregunta, y ya tengo mi respuesta. Es hora de prepararnos para nuestro festín». {n}El drukhari echa un último vistazo a los oficiales, que apenas pueden creerse la suerte que han tenido; luego se da la vuelta y se marcha dando zancadas.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous percevez un subtil changement dans son regard : le feu qui y brûlait s'éteint subitement pour laisser la place à la déception... et à l'ennui.{/n} « Bon... J'avais une question en me présentant sur ce pont. J'ai désormais une réponse. Il est temps d'aller préparer notre festin. » {n}Le Drukhari jette un dernier coup d'œil aux officiers qui ne parviennent pas encore à réaliser leur chance, tourne les talons et s'éloigne à grands pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The expression in his eyes subtly changes — the fire that burned in them disappears, leaving behind disappointment... and boredom.{/n} "Well. I came to the bridge with a question, and now I have the answer. It is time to prepare for our feast." {n}The Drukhari casts one last look at the officers, who do not seem to believe their luck, then turns and strides off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous percevez un subtil changement dans son regard : le feu qui y brûlait s'éteint subitement pour laisser la place à la déception... et à l'ennui.{/n} « Bon... J'avais une question en me présentant sur ce pont. J'ai désormais une réponse. Il est temps d'aller préparer notre festin. » {n}Le Drukhari jette un dernier coup d'œil aux officiers qui ne parviennent pas encore à réaliser leur chance, tourne les talons et s'éloigne à grands pas.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Ausdruck in seinen Augen verändert sich auf subtile Weise – das Feuer verschwindet und es bleibt nur Enttäuschung ... und Langeweile.{/n} "Gut. Ich bin mit einer Frage auf die Brücke gekommen und habe jetzt meine Antwort. Es wird Zeit, unser Fest vorzubereiten." {n}Der Drukhari wirft einen letzten Blick auf die Offiziere, die ihr Glück nicht fassen können. Dann dreht er sich um und entfernt sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The expression in his eyes subtly changes — the fire that burned in them disappears, leaving behind disappointment... and boredom.{/n} "Well. I came to the bridge with a question, and now I have the answer. It is time to prepare for our feast." {n}The Drukhari casts one last look at the officers, who do not seem to believe their luck, then turns and strides off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ausdruck in seinen Augen verändert sich auf subtile Weise – das Feuer verschwindet und es bleibt nur Enttäuschung ... und Langeweile.{/n} "Gut. Ich bin mit einer Frage auf die Brücke gekommen und habe jetzt meine Antwort. Es wird Zeit, unser Fest vorzubereiten." {n}Der Drukhari wirft einen letzten Blick auf die Offiziere, die ihr Glück nicht fassen können. Dann dreht er sich um und entfernt sich.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼の目の表情がかすかに変化する。その目に燃えていた炎は消えさり、そこに残されたのは失望と…退屈だった。{/n}「さて。俺はある疑問を持ってブリッジに来た。そして今、その答えを得た。さあ、宴の準備の時間だ」{n}自分たちの幸運を信じていないであろう士官たちへとデュカーリは最後の一瞥を投げかけると、彼らに背を向けて歩き出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The expression in his eyes subtly changes — the fire that burned in them disappears, leaving behind disappointment... and boredom.{/n} "Well. I came to the bridge with a question, and now I have the answer. It is time to prepare for our feast." {n}The Drukhari casts one last look at the officers, who do not seem to believe their luck, then turns and strides off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の目の表情がかすかに変化する。その目に燃えていた炎は消えさり、そこに残されたのは失望と…退屈だった。{/n}「さて。俺はある疑問を持ってブリッジに来た。そして今、その答えを得た。さあ、宴の準備の時間だ」{n}自分たちの幸運を信じていないであろう士官たちへとデュカーリは最後の一瞥を投げかけると、彼らに背を向けて歩き出した。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gözlerindeki ifade, belli belirsiz değişiyor. İçlerinde yanan ateş, kaybolarak yerini hayal kırıklığına ve... Can sıkıntısına bırakıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Köprüye bir soru sormaya geldim, şimdi de cevabımı aldım. Ziyafetimize hazırlanma vaktimiz geldi." {n}Drukhari, şanslarının yaver gittiğine inanamayan subaylara son bir bakış atarak dönüyor ve hızlıca uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The expression in his eyes subtly changes — the fire that burned in them disappears, leaving behind disappointment... and boredom.{/n} "Well. I came to the bridge with a question, and now I have the answer. It is time to prepare for our feast." {n}The Drukhari casts one last look at the officers, who do not seem to believe their luck, then turns and strides off.{/n}

Köprüye bir soru sormaya geldim, şimdi de cevabımı aldım. Ziyafetimize hazırlanma vaktimiz geldi." {n}Drukhari, şanslarının yaver gittiğine inanamayan subaylara son bir bakış atarak dönüyor ve hızlıca uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
